Name: Easy Poetry
About the game: Easy Poetry helps you write your own Chinese poem——and everything else with poetic forms. Key features: ·Automatically marks poetic forms that one must follow or notice ·Automatically checks for Ping Ze and rhymes ·Includes nearly 100 poetic forms, including Lv, Jue, Ci, and other traditional or modern poems ·Beginner-speaker friendly rhymes ·Beginner friendly tutorials ·Supports exporting, adjusting and importing custom poetic forms ·Supports creating your own custom poetic forms ·Uses Ping Ze and rhymes to filter for available characters ·Supports copy & share with one click ·Full English user interface
Meta Title: Easy Poetry: Aug 17, 2022, Egg Fried Rice and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Easy Poetry? Check out the release date (Aug 17, 2022), developer insights from Egg Fried Rice, and a complete game summary.
